node.address: Kilometer 18, road I-19 (Via al Mar) , Cali, Colombia

content.value:
At 1,800 meters above sea level, the property is located at twice the elevation of Cali. It can be found 450 meters from the highest point on the road that drives from Cali to Buenaventura, named kilometre 18, which is somewhat of a rest stop on the road with restaurants nearby.

There are seven rooms available, four of them are dorms and three are private. All the rooms have Satellite TV. There are two mixed dorms, and two female dorms. One female dorm has its own bathroom; the other three dorms share one bathroom. One private room has one bathroom; the other two privates share one bathroom.

description.description: The house is a great place to get away from the Cali heat and enjoy natural surroundings. Located at the top of a mountain, it provides cool climate and spectacular views without having to leave behind amenities such as satellite TV or high speed internet. There is a wide range of bird species nearby to go bird watching and plenty of nature trails to go hiking as well. Return to the house at the end of the day to relax your muscles and enjoy a dip in the Jacuzzi with warm water in cold weather. It is a perfect stop for those planning a trip to San Cipriano or Buenaventura as it is conveniently located on the way.
